title: ScoreCard: Best Attribute Bonanza Round 2.
body:
**Game Stats**

Game: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/GD/7KcKW0A5-best-attribute-bonanza-round-2?show=flat

Competitor : Score (Career) / Upvotes (Career) / Downvotes (Career) / Win (Career) / Loss (Career) / Played (Career)

VirginRivenMain: 1 / 2 / 1 / 0 / 0 / 1 ___(2 / 5 / 3 / 0 / 0 / 2)

2ndChance: 3 / 6 / 3 / 0 / 0 / 1 (1st career game)

Rockman: 1 / 2 / 1 / 0 / 0 / 1 ___ (10 / 12 / 2 / 0 / 0 / 2)

Alaron Mercer: 3 / 5 / 2 / 0 / 0 / 1  (1st career game)

Besteau: 6 / 7 / 1 / 1 / 0 / 1 ___ (7 / 9 / 2 / 1 / 0 / 2)

Burger and Fries: -3 / 1 / 4 / 0 / 1 / 1 ___ ( 2 / 6 / 4 / 0 / 1 / 2)

PartyPanda12: 3 / 3 / 0 / 0 / 0 / 1 ___ (2 / 4 / 2 / 0 / 0 / 2)

ChickenWrap: -1 / 2 / 3 / 0 / 0 / 1 ___ (6 / 10 / 4 / 0 / 0 / 2)

CLGEar: 2 / 3 / 1 / 0 / 0 / 1  (1st career game)

BustyDemoness: 1 / 2 / 1 / 0 / 0 / 1 ___ (1 / 6 / 5 / 0 / 0 / 2)

nm1010: 4 / 4 / 0 / 0 / 0 / 1 ___ (16 / 18 / 2 / 1 / 0 / 2)

VortexDragon2000: 3 / 3 / 0 / 0 / 0 / 1  (1st career game)

Leaf of the Lake : 1 / 2 / 1 / 0 / 0 / 1  (1st career game)

CTElephant: 3 / 3 / 0 / 0 / 0 / 1 ___ (4 / 4 / 0 / 0 / 0 / 2)

**Game Awards**

Champion: Besteau

Vanquished: Burger and Fries

Top Competitor: VirginRivenMain

Flawless: CTElephant (2), VortexDragon2000, nm1010, PartyPanda12

Most Flawless: CTElephant (2)

Top Comment: ChickenWrap (3), our all time Top Commentor is still Throwing Rocks (13)

**Face Time**

As Champion of Best Attribute Bonanza, you, Besteau, are now entitled to some Face Time. Take a second to tell us all what's on your mind in one short paragraph, there are no rules, lie, swear, proposition a horse, demand a buffet dinner, w/e. The Face Time is all yours. Please start the Face Time post with " Face Time " to let us know you are partaking of your Champion's right.

**What's next?**

Round 3 will be Attribute/Movie. Lemme know when ya'll wanna play and that Round will begin.
